name: The password must be at least 5 characters long.
Must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Must contain at least one number.
Must contain at least one special character (such as @, #, !, etc.).
Must contain the initial of the current day of the week (e.g., if today is Tuesday, include a T).
Must contain the name of a country that starts with the same letter as the first character in your password.
Must include the number of moves needed for checkmate in the given chess position.
Must contain a color in English (e.g., Red, Blue, Green, etc.).
Must include the current date in DD-MM-YYYY format or similar.
Must follow the spelling rules of a specific language (such as not using numbers).
Must include the name of a constellation.
Must include the name of a Pok√©mon.
